ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/RamdaPlay.xcworkspace -scheme RamdaPlay -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/RamdaPlay.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme RamdaPlay -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.sim.releaseLocal.build: export CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO && export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/RamdaPlay.xcworkspace -UseModernBuildSystem=YES -arch x86_64 -scheme RamdaPlay -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet
